A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars at its most daring and exhilarating since Empire Strikes Back. As someone who found The Force Awakens to be a very fun if slightly familiars romp that reminded me why I enjoy Star Wars so much and Rogue One to be an entertaining take on the more \"war\,\" side of Star Wars that lacked when it came to crafting characters that I truly cared for\, this is the experience I've been waiting for. Ryan Johnson and all involved have truly delivered. The new generation is finally truly here and I hope from this point forward\, we continue to get daring\, character driven stories that really prove that Star Wars takes place in a Galaxy\, far far away.
